desc: Show your spirit of adventure with gear from Papa's Pilar Rum.

layout.text: Ernest Hemingway lived an epic life of perpetual motion and impressive feats. He had a great many passions, but his one true constant was his beloved boat, Pilar. She was the esteemed vessel of his endeavors allowing America’s literary giant to reach beyond the shoreline and collect tales each more epic than the last. Papa’s Pilar is crafted for those who live their life with this kind of intention. Always a pioneer and pathfinder — NEVER A SPECTATOR.
